courseDescription:
Wix is a web-based platform that enables you to create websites without the need to learn any programming languages. You can create a unique site that meets every requirement with the help of customisable themes and templates, drag-and-drop components and other impressive tools. This course will provide a comprehensive, step-by-step tutorial on how to build a professional website from scratch using Wix and explores the basics of email marketing and how to improve your web traffic.

We will begin with a lesson on selecting a Wix plan that satisfies your needs, then guide you through creating a landing page and adding more pages and other content to your website. Some Wix apps that can drive traffic to your website will also be covered. You will also discover how to develop email autoresponders and automated response sequences by following along with the examples and walkthroughs provided. After that, you will explore ways to send email shoutouts, monitor trends and add other people to grow your email list.

Email marketing is the backbone of many businesses today and with Wix email marketing, you can quickly adopt all the latest email marketing techniques to advertise your brand. Discover how to make money from your email list while increasing traffic to your landing pages. In the concluding section, you will learn how to run Facebook and retarget ads to grow your business and use other alternative ways to get traffic to your website. This course is essential for developers, entrepreneurs, internet marketers or anybody developing a website, landing page or email list. Register today and start learning.
